deleteLocalData.confirmMessage: Deleting stored local data forces Jeff to refetch all your household data remotely. Pages will load slower and actions will take longer to perform until the cache is repopulated. Note that this will not clear cached application assets. Continue?

logout.confirmMessage: Logging out causes all authorization data saved on your machine to expire and all local household data to be deleted. Except for changing accounts, logging out is usually not necessary. Continue?

deleteAccount.confirmMessage1: All your personal data (i.e. name, email, password, and nickname) will be permanently deleted from our server and from this device. Your household will remember you by the beautiful name of "Unknown User" and all your expenses and former tasks will remind them of you in a melancholic yet heartwarming way. You are to be logged out of this application and it will be as if all this never happened. Still - never will you be forgotten, Unknown User.
deleteAccount.confirmMessage2: But seriously: {bold} So, to end with the inspiring words of one of the great minds of our time:
